name: Drink 'n' Draw
description: Draw, scribble, doodle, sketch and drink! Fun different drawing games and a Communal Doodle™ wall, with all arts materials provided, beginners welcome. There is a suggested donation of £4 to cover the cost for pens and paper. See the website for FAQs!

location.address: Tobacco Factory, Raleigh Rd, Bristol, BS3 1TF
location.details: The Tobacco Factory, the drawing group is located in the Snug (room to the right of the bar).

cost.details: There is a suggested donation of £4 to cover the cost of arts materials - there is no entrance fee, any donations are much appreciated.
